meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Inferiority</kanji> is what I feel because I don't have an <kanji>equal</kanji> <kanji>feeling</kanji> with you. This is due to my <vocabulary>inferiority complex</vocabulary>, my <vocabulary>sense of inferiority </vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
